name: Tool Validator
description: Tool calling validation and repair for local AI models

enabled.label: Enable Validation
enabled.help: Enable tool call validation and repair

repairStrategy.label: Repair Strategy
repairStrategy.help: How to handle invalid tool calls: coerce (try to fix types), default (use defaults), prompt (ask user), block (reject)

blockOnValidationFailure.label: Block on Failure
blockOnValidationFailure.help: Block tool calls that fail validation (even if unrepairable)

blockDangerousCalls.label: Block Dangerous Calls
blockDangerousCalls.help: Block potentially dangerous tool calls (shell injection, path traversal, etc.)

allowToolNameFuzzyMatch.label: Fuzzy Match Tool Names
allowToolNameFuzzyMatch.help: Allow fuzzy matching of tool names for typos

maxFuzzyMatchDistance.label: Max Fuzzy Distance
maxFuzzyMatchDistance.help: Maximum edit distance for fuzzy tool name matching

strictMode.label: Strict Mode
strictMode.help: Block all tool calls with any validation error
